account_enableSync_message.message: Your settings are currently not being synced. Push the button below to start synchronizing these settings across all your browsers.

account_enableSync_tip.message: TIP: If you have Fake Filler installed on multiple browsers, first enable sync on the browser where you have updated the settings most recently. That way, your other browsers will have the latest settings.

account_error_noAccount.message: This email address does not have a Fake Filler account.

account_error_unknownLoginError.message: An unknown error occurred while logging in.

account_showSupportMessage.message: Hello there! If Fake Filler makes you more productive, please consider showing your support by subscribing to the Pro edition. Subscriptions help to support the continued development of Fake Filler. I hate ads as much as you do so charging for a subscription is the only way I make money. So go ahead and hit the buy button now.

backupRestore_confirmImportOldBackup.message: Are you absolutely sure? Restoring this backup could cause the extension to crash.

backupRestore_confirmRestore.message:
Are you sure you want to restore the settings?

Note: Existing settings will be replaced.

backupRestore_copyAndSaveToFile.message: Copy and save this to a text file.

backupRestore_errorReadingFile.message: There was an error while reading the backup file.

backupRestore_oldBackupErrorMessage.message: The backup file you are trying to restore was created using an older version of the extension and cannot be imported.

backupRestore_settingImportSuccessMessag.message: Settings imported successfully! You will need to reload all your tabs for the settings to take effect.

bgPage_errorMigratingOptions.message: An error occurred while migrating Fake Filler options: $1

browserActionTitle.message: Fill All Inputs with Dummy Data

customFields_alNumHelp_otherCharactersAs.message: Any other character will be output as-is. The above characters can be escaped by wrapping them in [square brackets].

customFields_dateTypeHelp.message: Uses moment.js to format date/time values. Please refer to the moment.js documentation. This will be ignored for type="date" fields.

customFields_delete_confirm_message.message: Are you sure you want to delete this custom field?

customFields_getMoreInfo.message: More information on how the extension matches custom fields

customFields_intro.message: Fake Filler can use the ID, NAME and CLASS values of an input field in addition to the label text to determine its data type.

customFields_label_date_helpText.message: Enter a negative value to generate a date in the past.

customFields_label_decimalPlaces_helpTex.message: The number of digits after the decimal point. e.g. 2 will generate X.XX, and 3 will generate X.XXX

customFields_label_hostName_listTextHelp.message: List each name with a comma. You may include the @ sign as well.

customFields_label_hostName_randomLabel.message: Use a randomly generated host name

customFields_label_listItems_placeholder.message: Enter each item on a new line.

customFields_label_match_helpText.message: Enter comma separated values (in lowercase) to match, or a regular expression. Make sure your regular expression does not have a comma.

customFields_label_match_placeholder.message: Comma-separated values or a regular expression.

customFields_label_previousName.message: Previously generated first and last name

customFields_label_telephoneTemplate_hel.message: Use X for a number between 1-9 and x for 0-9.

customFields_label_username_listLabel.message: Select from the list below (List each name with a comma.):

customFields_label_username_nameLabel.message: Use a previously generated first and last name

customFields_regExHelp.message: Uses randexp.js to generate random data based on a regular expression pattern.

customFields_validation_atLeastOneValueI.message: Please enter at least one value in this group.

customFields_validation_invalidEmailHost.message: Please select the email hostname generation option.

customFields_validation_invalidEmailUser.message: Please select the email username generation option.

customFields_validation_invalidMaxLength.message: The maximum length value must be greater than one.

customFields_validation_invalidMaxValue.message: The minimum value must be greater than one.

customFields_validation_invalidMinMaxVal.message: The maximum value cannot be less than the minimum value.

customFields_validation_missingAlNumTemp.message: Please specify a format template for this field.

customFields_validation_missingDateTempl.message: Please enter a template for the date.

customFields_validation_missingDecimalPl.message: Please enter the number of decimal places.

customFields_validation_missingMatch.message: Please enter comma-separated values or a regular expression.

customFields_validation_missingMaxLength.message: Please enter a value for the maximum length.

customFields_validation_missingName.message: Please enter a name for this custom field.

customFields_validation_missingTelephone.message: Please enter a template for the telephone number.

customFields_validation_onlyOneValueInGr.message: Please enter only one value in this group.

extensionDescription.message: A form filler that fills all inputs on a page with fake/dummy data.

generalSettings_agreeToTermsMatchHelp.message: Checkboxes matching any of these values will always be checked.

generalSettings_confirmFieldsHelp.message: Data entered in a preceding input field will be used for inputs matching any of these values.

generalSettings_contextMenuLabel.message: Add items to the right click menu

generalSettings_defaultMaxLength_help.message: The default maximum number of characters to fill with dummy text (when no custom fields match).

generalSettings_ignoreFieldsWithContentL.message: Ignore fields that already have content

generalSettings_matchFields_help.message: Please refer to the custom fields section to learn how input elements are matched.

generalSettings_matchFields_mustSelectOn.message: You must select at least one option.

generalSettings_matchFields_useAriaLabel.message: aria-label attribute of the input tag
aria-labelledby attribute of the input tag

generalSettings_matchFields_useClass.message: Class attribute of the input tag

generalSettings_matchFields_useId.message: ID attribute of the input tag

generalSettings_matchFields_useLabel.message: Label text for the input tag

generalSettings_matchFields_useName.message: Name attribute of the input tag

generalSettings_matchFields_usePlacehold.message: Placeholder attribute of the input tag

generalSettings_passwordHelp.message: Leave this blank to generate a random 8 character password (is logged in the console).

generalSettings_password_randomLabel.message: Generate a random 8 character password (is logged in the console)

generalSettings_triggerEventsLabel.message: Trigger click/change events on input fields

generalSettings_validation_enterAtLeastO.message: You must select at least one option.

generalSettings_validation_invalidDefaul.message: The default maximum length value must be greater than zero.

leftNav_confirmResetSettings.message: Are you sure you want to reset to the default settings?

leftNav_sendFeedback.message: If you have any suggestions to make this extension better, or find any issues, please send me an email.

profile_delete_confirm_message.message: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?

profile_label_urlMatch_helpText.message: Enter a regular expression to match the URL that this profile will apply to.

profile_validation_missingName.message: Enter a name for this profile

profile_validation_missingUrlMatch.message: Please enter a regular expression to match the URL.
